sections.heading: Priority of lien; transfer of lien upon execution sale
sections.text:
(a) All water rents laid or imposed by the Board of Water Commissioners for the City of Wilmington, remaining unpaid and in arrears for 30 days after they become due, shall be and constitute a lien upon the lands and premises of the owner to whi
§

 1; 

25 Del. C. 1953,

§

 4501;§

4502. Duration of lien.The lien for water rents shall remain a lien for the period of 5 years and no longer from the expiration of 30 days after the water rents became due and payable.43 Del. Laws, c. 142,

§

 2; 

25 Del. C. 1953,

§

 4502;
